snippet: It may sound like a mystery fruit, but appleberry is the best of fruit pie worlds: the substantial, hearty texture of apples fused with fresh or frozen sweet, tart berries.

headline.main: Can You Bake a Vegan Pie?
headline.name: Appleberry Pie
Shaved Fennel and Apples With Mandarin Vinaigrette

snippet: “One of my favorite things to do with leftover turkey is chop it up and make a turkey salad with nuts and fruit mixed with mayo and Dijon,” says Chef Mauro. But for people who don’t eat meat, brussels sprouts are a delicious substitute. “I love br...

Path, a mobile social network that limited users to 50 friends, hopes to reinvigorate itself with a new version that expands the circle to 150 people. Path 2.0 comes with an array of new "moments" that can be shared, including the music people are...
abstract: Path, a mobile social network that limited users to 50 friends, hopes to reinvigorate itself with a new version that expands the circle to 150 people. Path 2.0 comes with an array of new "moments" that can be shared, including the music people are listening to, whom people are with, where they are and when they go to sleep and wake up.

headline.main: Path Tries Again With a Wider Network

snippet: RIM’s decision to bring some BlackBerry features to Apple iPhones and iPads as well as smartphones and tablet computers running Google’s Android operating system was driven by the large number of corporations that are letting employees...
abstract: RIM’s decision to bring some BlackBerry features to Apple iPhones and iPads as well as smartphones and tablet computers running Google’s Android operating system was driven by the large number of corporations that are letting employees choose their own smartphones.

headline.main: RIM Reacts to Bring-Your-Own Devices Policies

snippet: The Y.M.C.A., one of the nation’s largest child-care providers, will offer fruits, vegetables and water for snacks, increase exercise time and limit video games.
abstract: Young Men's Christian Association, one of the nation’s largest child-care providers, will offer fruits, vegetables and water for snacks, increase exercise time and limit video games; guidelines grow out of discussions the YMCA has been having with Michelle Obama and the Partnership for a Healthier America, a nonprofit group dedicated to supporting the first lady's campaign to reduce childhood obesity.

headline.main: Y.M.C.A. Adopting Health Policies for Youth
headline.print_headline: Y.M.C.A. Adopting Health Policies for Youth

snippet: Siri, Apple's virtual assistant software, appears to draw a blank when some users ask it to suggest an abortion clinic. A founder of Siri said it was not clear whether its inability to produce answers to specific queries was a deliberate decision ...
abstract: Siri, Apple's virtual assistant software, appears to draw a blank when some users ask it to suggest an abortion clinic. A founder of Siri said it was not clear whether its inability to produce answers to specific queries was a deliberate decision on Apple's part.

headline.main: Apple's Siri Stumbles Over an Abortion Question

snippet: According to a new report to be issued Wednesday by Nielsen, the market research firm, Google and Apple are both winning in the mobile smartphone race. Android has become the operating system of choice for most consumers, partly because of the ine...
abstract: According to a new report to be issued Wednesday by Nielsen, the market research firm, Google and Apple are both winning in the mobile smartphone race. Android has become the operating system of choice for most consumers, partly because of the inexpensive handset options available through phone carriers. Apple’s iPhone has become the predominant hardware choice, for 29 percent of all smartphone owners.

headline.main: Google and Apple Are Both Winners in Mobile Race, Report Says

snippet: Under various noms de porc — like Pig Wings — ham shanks are being served at restaurants and bars across the country.
abstract: Pig wings or ham shanks are being served at restaurants and bars across the country under a variety of names (Series: United Tastes).

headline.main: As Tasty Morsels, Pig Wings Take Flight

snippet: The Newtown Pippin variety is the only apple used in a new cider from Original Sin.
abstract: Newtown Pippin variety is the only apple used in a new cider from Original Sin.

headline.main: A Hard Cider From an Heirloom Apple
